summary: Comprehensive testing completed for KHGT Digital Prayer Time Display App. All core functionalities working correctly including TV display, authentication, dashboard, prayer times API, and content management.

minor_fixes_applied.fix: Added status_code=201 to content, agenda, and running text creation endpoints

passed_tests: Backend API - 100% success rate (24/24 tests passed)
TV Display page - Shows prayer times, countdown, mosque info, clock correctly
Authentication system - Registration and login working with JWT
Dashboard navigation - All pages (Identity, Content, Agenda, Running Text, Settings, Layout) accessible
Prayer times API integration - KHGT API working correctly with live data
Content slideshow system - Displaying announcements properly
Running text system - Scrolling text at bottom working
Countdown functionality - Live countdown to next prayer with proper formatting
Bell notification system - Shows bell reminder settings
Mosque identity management - Update and display working correctly
Responsive design - Modern dark theme with proper typography and layout
